com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core

Class CobwebSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.CobwebSwitch

  • public final class CobwebSwitch
extends Object
    A mutable cobweb switch.

    This class may be used to track whether the user wants to display the cobweb edges and vertices.

    When the switch is ON, the cobweb is displayed. When the switch is OFF, the cobweb is hidden.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CobwebSwitch(boolean isEnabled)
      Creates a new switch by pre-setting the state.
